one bad experience with mkv before, but this is worth the risk. also for 12 giB, everyone please seed

Good show, Most Episodes were recorded on ABC Family, some from disney, and the rest were the actual DVD rip. One episode in season 4 has now sound, and 6 or 7 episodes had audio 1 second too fast, overall

A:8/10
V:9/10

Great show, I used to love watching this every Friday night on ABC.

There was a light gray screen and the image would only come on for about two seconds before the screen would come back, it does it on all the episodes. When the image came on it kind of looked like when a TV messes up during a storm. The audio was fine though it was just the video. Has anyone else had this problem?
I looked around and found DivX Plus and it has fixed the problem. I was using VLC player before. Very good quality for the size.
